AN EXPOSITION OF THE Book of the Prophet ISAIAH.By the endeavours of W. DAY M. A. late Fellow of Kin
1. THE PREFACE TO THE CHRISTIAN READER.

1. AN EXPLANATION Of thoſe TERMES OF ART, And RHETORICALL TROPES AND FIGVRES Which moſt frequently occurre in this BOOK.

1. To theſe take (good Reader) the meaning of theſe words and Characters following.
